Grab some dice and some friends and play the role of new heroes in training!
New! Unused Shipping and BGG Fees $5
U
Buyer pays $6 for shipping.

boardgame.name: The Sunken Temple of Set
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

In a concerted effort to spread discord and evil among the mortal races, the god Set sired many bastard offspring via its dalliances among them. The result was a jumble of divine and mortal traits, but all of his children were hideous snake, reptilian, and humanoid crossbreeds. Each was a unique, twisted fiend, as Set steeped his creations in chaotic sorcery. These he called his sons, and they were spread far and wide to disseminate their vile plots.

listing.notes: U

boardgame.name: Level 1 - Volume 2 2021: We All Wear Masks
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Level 1 - Volume 2 2021: We All Wear Masks
...
Indie RPG anthology

From the back of the book:

Some of the games inside are silly, and some can be played solo, and others meant for a table. Some use dice, and use tarot cards. What they all have in common is a unique and interesting take on the hobby that we all love - Roleplaying!

Volume 1 was released for FreeRPG day 2020.

listing.notes: Buyer buys $5 for shipping.

boardgame.name: How To Build a Boss Fight Final Chamber
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Once again, Dave Taylor Miniatures has created an instructional booklet on how to build and paint an epic "boss fight" final chamber using the Gamemaster Terrain Kit from The Army Painter AND how to paint items from Mantic Games' Dungeon Treasure set. One booklet and one treasure pile per person, from your friendly, local game store on Free RPG Day 2021.

listing.notes:
Once again, Dave Taylor Miniatures has created an instructional booklet on how to build and paint an epic "boss fight" final chamber using the Gamemaster Terrain Kit from The Army Painter AND how to paint items from Mantic Games' Dungeon Treasure set. One booklet and one treasure pile per person, from your friendly, local game store on Free RPG Day 2021.
New! Unplayed Shipping and BGG Fees $6

Buyer pays $10 shipping. Includes Mantic Games Terrain Crate (5 Packs)
Armors Halberd Axe Sword Spear
Sword Pedestal Other Magic Items
Stack Of Treasure Chests
Pile Of Gold with Treasure Chest
Piles Of Gold with Helmet

boardgame.name: The Luminous Aviary
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Luminous Aviary is a book of fictional birds for use with conventional fantasy settings where magic abounds, people live among vibrant natural landscapes, and adventurers delve into ancient ruins. These birds aren't monsters to slay; they are members of ecosystems, cultural touchstones, and narrative catalysts. Game masters and worldbuilders can use them to flesh out settings and provide narrative hooks for their characters.

Contents:

8 different bird entries, ranging in habitat from dark forests to tropical climates, arctic regions, and aethereal planes
A full-color illustration for each bird, including two full-page illustrations
Guidance on integrating the birds of the Luminous Aviary into your fantasy world

boardgame.name: Big Bad Booklet: Zara Harlowe
Humblewood - The Heart of Dako / Big Bad Booklet: Zara Harlowe
boardgame.description:
User summary:

This item includes two products - "Big Bad Book: Zara Harlowe" and "Humblewood: The Heart of Dako", both for the D&D 5e System.

The two products are printed in "flippie" organization - the one half is one product, the second half is the second product but printed upside-down in relation to the first half.

listing.notes:
Humblewood Adventures - The Heart of Dako / Big Bad Booklet: Zara Harlowe 5e Game System Product (D&D 5th Edition Compatible)
Double Trouble over @Hit Point Press! For this year's Free RPG Day they have a new Humblewood adventure, and an exclusive Big Bad!
"Big Bad Book: Zara Harlowe" and "Humblewood: The Heart of Dako", both for the D&D 5e System. Printed in "flippie" organization - the one half is one product, the second half is the second product but printed upside-down in relation to the first half.
Brand New! Shipping and BGG Fees $6

boardgame.name: 18CZ: Bonus Boards
boardgame.description:
Hard bonus boards for putting away stocks and an additional map for a 2-3 player scenario.

Only nine companies remain in the game, three of each size.

There is a third automatic player in the game, whose name is Václav.

boardgame.name: Root the RPG: The Bertram's Cove Quickstart
Root: The Tabletop Roleplaying Game Bertram's Cove Quickstart
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The 2021 Free RPG Day booklet for Root: The Roleplaying Game contains pre-generated characters and a full clearing write up along with all the rules to get you started playing quickly!

listing.notes:
The 2021 Free RPG Day booklet for Root: The Roleplaying Game contains pre-generated characters and a full clearing write up along with all the rules to get you started playing quickly!
New! Unused Shipping and BGG Fees $6
Buyer pays $9 for shipping.

boardgame.name: Rolling in the Deep
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

In Rolling in the Deep, a group of level-4 adventurers visits Green Shore Hamlet after learning of the atrocities that happened there. A band of ravaging, blood-thirsty sahuagin captured some of their fishermen, leaving fear and uncertainty in its poor place...

The characters track the sahuagin back to their lair. They must find a way to overcome the challenges of swimming underwater and the darkness of the caverns. Glu'Dur'Boog, the leader of the sahuagin, has the power of Targul, an otherworldly entity that demands countless human sacrifices. Not even the heroes are safe in here...

boardgame.name: Spell Spud
boardgame.description:
A long forgotten power has reemerged, a conduit of great magic and ruin. Though dangerous and hot to the touch, you cannot resist the chance to control it. Willing wizards, are you ready to duel your friends to emerge victorious and unlock the secrets hidden within...the Spell Spud???

Spell Spud is a 2-6 player elimination game in which players pass around the hot potato while trying to avoid burning their hands. Cast spells, trap your foes, and be the last wizard standing to gain victory in this easy to learn, but surprisingly deep, card game!

Each player chooses a unique pair of hands to represent themselves. When it’s your turn, you get to choose which hand you hold the potato with. If a Hand is burned, it’s flipped to the ‘Burned’ side. If it’s burned again, it’s out. With two hands, players have a chance to come back if they’ve had a rough start.

The potato is the core of the game. Each player starts their turn with it in their possession, allowing them access to their actions while also placing them at risk of being burned.

Players can take two actions during their turn. You may use an action to draw from the Spell Deck, which holds several useful spells to defend yourself from harm or place your foes into dangerous situations. But, it also costs an action to cast most spells, so think ahead to utilize your actions most effectively.

boardgame.name: Reap and Sow
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Our Free RPG Day adventure, Reap and Sow, follows a group of epic heroes as they defend a fledgling settlement in the Realm of Death, which finds itself under siege by a nightmarish army of the undead.

listing.notes:
RPG Day provides exclusive printed content for a wide variety of tabletop roleplaying games via friendly local games stores around the world. Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Soulbound launched just last year, so this year we offer players a chance to dip their toes into the Mortal Realms.
Age of Sigmar: Soulbound is set in Games Workshop’s mythic fantasy setting of Warhammer Age of Sigmar, where gods and monsters wage endless war in eight near-infinite realms. Players take on the role of Soulbound, god-chosen heroes of great power brought together through an arcane ritual and granted the might to stand against the tide of Chaos, Death, and Destruction.
The RPG Day adventure, Reap & Sow, follows a group of epic heroes as they defend a fledgling settlement in the Realm of Death, which finds itself under siege by a nightmarish army of the undead.
Brand New! Unplayed Shipping and BGG Fees $6
Buyer pays $6 shipping.

boardgame.name: Victoriana: Going Underground
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Our Free RPG Day adventure, Going Underground, gives you a taste of the world, with a trip on the very first electrified tube train.

listing.notes:
Going Underground, gives a taste of the world, with a trip on the very first electrified tube train. Victoriana is launching soon under the fifth edition Open Gaming License, Free RPG Day was the perfect time to give gamers a taste of what is to come!
Victoriana takes place in a fantastic alternate world of 1887, where the old ways of magic and tradition are losing ground to science, revolution, and the cloying smoke of industrialization. The player characters, or Associates, navigate this dangerous world, solving mysteries, making social connections, and confronting horrors, while uncovering the secret conspiracies that operate in the shadows. Whether the Associates fight them or join them remains to be seen…
New! Unused Shipping and BGG Fees $6
Buyer pays $5 for shipping.

boardgame.name: Lost Throne of Talukeld the Broken (Basic Fantasy)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Talukeld the Broken was a leader of a great horde of warriors who swept in from the West, conquering the Known World. It is said that his throne, made from the bones of his enemies, has manifested numerous magical powers.

The Kingdom of Kriqatha is threatened. An army of giants with invasion in mind is massing on Kriqatha’s borders. The adventurers have been called to the palace of King Goscelinus, where they are tasked with questing for the Lost Throne.

With the throne in the King’s possession, nothing can stand before his army. His knights will sweep all his foes into the sea — but only if the adventurers can bring back the throne in time.

Talukeld’s Tomb is located deep in a fiery mountain two weeks from the King’s palace. It looms high above the blasted landscape of the Broken Lands.

If the adventurers have no transport, the King gives them horses, a cart, and the consumable supplies they’ll need for the journey to the tomb and back again. He also promises them 1,000 splonders each, along with the right to keep any treasure they find in the tomb (save for the throne itself).

The King gives the adventurers an ancient, crude map showing the way to Talukeld’s Tomb. No one has been there in generations, so nobody knows what dangers might be encountered along the journey, nor what they might find in the tomb once they arrive. The map has a curious symbol in one corner: a clenched fist holding a short, broad-bladed spear...

boardgame.name: Warhammer 40,000 (Eighth Edition): Codex Adeptus Astartes – Vanguard Space Marines
boardgame.description:
The Vanguard Space Marines are the finest reconnaissance and covert warfare troops available to the Adeptus Astartes. Their ranks filled by pious battle-brothers clad in specialised patterns of Mk X power armour and wielding the deadliest weapons available to the Imperium of Mankind.


The book contains a structure and history of the Vanguard formations
A uniform guide and showcase that includes a variety of colour schemes used by Vanguard Space Marines.
A comprehensive range of datasheets providing tabletop rules for every unit detailed in the codex.
Army-wide rules content.

boardgame.name: Blue Rose Quickstart
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The Blue Rose Quickstart is a compact and easy-to-use set of rules and an adventure scenario that needs nothing more than the Quickstart itself and some dice to get right down to playing. It also serves as an appetizer for Blue Rose's unique romantic fantasy setting, paying homage to the worlds of romantic fantasy fiction.

listing.notes:
The Blue Rose Quickstart is a compact and easy-to-use set of rules and an adventure scenario that needs nothing more than the Quickstart itself and some dice to get right down to playing. It also serves as an appetizer for Blue Rose's unique romantic fantasy setting, paying homage to the worlds of romantic fantasy fiction.
Brand New! Unplayed Shipping and BGG Fees $6
Buyer pays $9 for shipping.

boardgame.name: Loot Drops: Potions
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

This supplement is the first in a series of handy supplements for the Spears & Spells game published by Kabouter Games.

Inside, you get tables of ingredients, crafting rules, and 25+ all new potions for Spears & Spells and other Old School Renaissance games like Laybrinth Lord, Basic Fantasy, and Old School Essentials!

boardgame.name: Ashes of Power
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Long ago, the galaxy was ruled by the great Lazax Empire. For thousands of years, they governed over an era of peace and harmonious cooperation between thousands of species. However, no imperium can last forever.

listing.notes:
Intergalactic empires fall, but one faction will rise from the ashes to conquer the galaxy.
Once the mighty Lazax Empire ruled all the known galaxy from its capital planet of Mecatol Rex, before treachery and war erased the Lazax from history, plunging a thousand star systems into conflict and uncertainty.
Now the Great Races who span the galaxy look upon their former capital hungrily – the power and secrets of the Lazax await a new emperor… To lay claim to the throne is a destiny sought by many, yet the shadows of the past serve as a grim warning to those who would follow in their footsteps.
Ashes of Power is a preview of Embers of the Imperium. Both are set in the sprawling space opera epic of Twilight Imperium, a far future where various powerful factions vie for the vacant imperial throne and right to rule the galaxy. You take on the role of a team of Keleres who are sent to a recently rediscovered planet to track down a missing Keleres informant. Of course once you get there, you’ll need to navigate a unique culture comprised of three very different species, and survive when you inevitably run into a group of very unpleasant individuals with a vested interest in seeing you dead. After all, there are ancient secrets lurking on Herool’s Truce…
New ! Unplayed Shipping and BGG Fees $6

boardgame.name: Aerodome
boardgame.description:
WELCOME TO THE AERODOME! In this game you are pitted against other top pilots from around the multiverse! Challenge, fight, outfly and defeat them to become the greatest pilot in the Multiverse! Inside you will find all you need to take to the skies and become the best pilot in the universe!

Aerodome is a competitive head-to-head game where each turn you will play cards and activate abilities which will allow you to pilot your ship, fire your weapons and improve your vessels to become the ultimate piece of aviation and take out your opponents before they can claim you as their own victory.

——— Gameplay Description ———

Prior to a game, players build their maneuver hands using the Battle cards included or use a prebuilt hand following the pilots recommended hand found on the back of their card. These Battle cards detail the initiative the pilot will move in and the actions that the fighter will perform. At the start of a game turn, players simultaneously select one of their battle cards from their hand and reveal. The pilot with the highest revealed initiative will activate first completing all of the actions found on their card card (starting from the top to the bottom). After they are complete, their opponent completes their turn. Players use battle cards to move around the area of play and shoot their opponents.

This game is currently in Beta. Aiming for a Q4 2022 kickstarter date.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Into the Würmhole
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Into the Würmhole is a disgusting adventure set in the Vast Grimm universe. This intro adventure includes everything you need to play, except the dice. Try not to die, but more importantly, do your best not to get infected and become one of The Grimm.

listing.notes: U
Buyer pays $6 shipping.

boardgame.name: Warhammer 40,000 (Seventh Edition): Pandorax Campaign
boardgame.description:
A planet in the grip of chaos!

In 959 M41, Abaddon the Despoiler led a Chaos incursion fleet to invade the Imperial planet Pythos in the Pandorax star system. Within days the huge Chaos Space Marine army at his command had overrun the planet and opened a long forgotten Warp portal that unleashed a horde of Daemons upon the world.

In the book you will find:


The Pandorax Incursion which has a detailed history of the invasion
A battle report fought on an Imperial spaceship
A miniature showcase
Rules of Engagement
Datasheets

boardgame.name: Fabula Ultima: Press Start
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Fabula Ultima is a Tabletop Role-Playing Game inspired by JRPGs, the Japanese video game RPGs. In Fabula Ultima you and your friends will tell epic stories of aspiring heroes and fearsome villains, set in fantasy worlds brimming with magic, wondrous places, and uniquely bizarre monsters!

boardgame.name: Tales of the Realm: Curse of the Rat Queen
Talisman Adventures - Quick Start Guide: Curse of the Rat Queen
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Prepare for daring quests and mighty deeds in Curse of the Rat Queen, Pegasus Spiele's 2021 Free RPG Day Adventure for the Talisman Adventures Fantasy Roleplaying Game! This tale of betrayal and greed takes the heroes from a remote village filled with secrets to ancient ruins deep within a foreboding forest. Rats are in every shadow, but are they the true monsters of the tale?

boardgame.name: An Echo in the Darkness
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

The determined people who have chosen to rebuild the ruins of the fabled town of Ingrane want the same thing as the rest of the Iron Kingdoms: to rise from the ashes of an infernal invasion that nearly claimed the souls of most of the world.
